ttp_template:
<group name="int_ip_local_ldp_ident_msgs_rcvd">
Peer LDP Ident: 192.168.0.2:0; Local LDP Ident {{LOCAL_LDP_IDENT | ORPHRASE}}
State: {{STATE | ORPHRASE}}; Msgs sent/rcvd: 100000/100100; Downstream
Peer LDP Ident: {{PEER_LDP_IDENT | ORPHRASE}}; Local LDP Ident 192.168.0.1:0
TCP connection: {{TCP_CONNECTION | ORPHRASE}}
State: Oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: {{MSGS_SENT}}/{{MSGS_RCVD | ORPHRASE}}; Downstream
Up time: {{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}}
  Interface {{INT}} {{IP | ORPHRASE}}  
</group>
cli_content:
Peer LDP Ident: 192.168.0.2:0; Local LDP Ident 192.168.0.1:0
TCP connection: 192.168.0.2:179 -> 192.168.0.1:51052
State: Oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: 100000/100100; Downstream
Up time: 01:20:30
LDP discovery sources:
  Interface Ethernet0/0 (1.1.1.1)  
  Addresses bound to peer LDP Ident:
    192.168.0.2       1.1.1.2

Peer LDP Ident: 192.168.0.3:0; Local LDP Ident 192.168.0.1:0
TCP connection: 192.168.0.3:179 -> 192.168.0.1:51053
State: Oper; Msgs sent/rcvd: 100200/100300; Downstream
Up time: 02:30:40
LDP discovery sources:
  Interface Ethernet0/1 (1.1.2.1)  
  Addresses bound to peer LDP Ident:
    192.168.0.3       1.1.2.2
textfsm_template:
Value PEER_LDP_IDENT (\S+:\d+)
Value LOCAL_LDP_IDENT (\S+:\d+)
Value TCP_CONNECTION (\S+:\d+ -> \S+:\d+)
Value STATE (\S+)
Value MSGS_SENT (\d+)
Value MSGS_RCVD (\d+)
Value LABEL_SPACE_ID (\S+)
Value UPTIME (\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2})
Value INT (Ethernet\S+)
Value IP (\(\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+\))
Value ADDR (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)

Start
  ^Peer LDP Ident:\s+${PEER_LDP_IDENT}\; Local LDP Ident\s+${LOCAL_LDP_IDENT}\s*$$
  ^TCP connection:\s+${TCP_CONNECTION}\s*$$
  ^State:\s+${STATE};\s+Msgs sent\/rcvd:\s+${MSGS_SENT}\/${MSGS_RCVD}\;\s+Downstream\s*$$
  ^Up time:\s+${UPTIME}\s*$$
  ^LDP discovery sources:\s*$$
  ^\s+Interface ${INT}\s${IP}\s*$$
  ^\s+Addresses bound to peer LDP Ident:\s*$$
  ^\s+${ADDR}\s+${IP}\s*$$ -> Record
